resources.string: Welcome. Please Login or Sign Up
This is your one stop shop for all your shoe needs.\nWe offer shoes of all types, colors, sizes and functions.\nYou are bound to find the perfect fit for your specific tastes.

On the next page, you will find all the currently available shoes.
If you wish to learn more details about a specific shoe, click the "Details" button.
If you would like to offer your own shoe, click the button at the bottom and fill in some information regarding the shoe.
Happy Shoe Shopping!~
